item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ACF Has Been Hijacked (65 points | 5 comments)
2. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1084 points | 327 comments)
3. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (250 points | 73 comments)
4. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (109 points | 73 comments)
5. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (25 points | 7 comments)
6. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (39 points | 1 comment)
7. FLUX is fast and it's open source (76 points | 31 comments)
8. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (94 points | 8 comments)
9. Show HN: A free alternative to Typora –– IF (5 points | 5 comments)
10. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (35 points | 13 comments)
11. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (10 points | 5 comments)
12. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (424 points | 389 comments)
13. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (47 points | 8 comments)
14. Turkish language has a gossip tense (151 points | 130 comments)
15. The 1/8th Sleep (75 points | 9 comments)
16. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (690 points | 144 comments)
17. DuckStation (136 points | 49 comments)
18. Gödel Agent: A self-referential agent framework for recursive self-improvement (39 points | 10 comments)
19. Writing an animated 3-star popup with .NET MAUI and Lottie (3 points | discuss)
20. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (22 points | 2 comments)
21. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (211 points | 177 comments)
22. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (65 points | 31 comments)
23. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (458 points | 303 comments)
24. Home Libraries Will Save Civilization (31 points | 25 comments)
25. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (128 points | 23 comments)
26. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
27. Some Notes on Upgrading Hugo (8 points | 2 comments)
28. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (353 points | 51 comments)
29. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (78 points | 151 comments)
30. PayPal (USA) will automatically share data about you to participating stores (245 points | 92 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
